title: Làm bài luyện đọc | Luyện đề VSTEP

reading.title: Làm bài luyện đọc | Luyện đề VSTEP

passages.content:
Câu 1: Which of the following is said about the idea that blood types and personalities are related?
A. It is more popular in Asian countries than in the West.
B. It is used in schools and workplaces to categorize people.
C. It was originally developed by a Japanese scientist.
D. Its accuracy has been supported with scientific data.
Câu 2: What does the word “it” in paragraph (A) refer to?
A. blood
B. school
C. personality
D. theory
Câu 3: What is learnt about blood type A personality?
A. They cannot perform in jobs that require frequent contact with others.
B. They often suppress their own feelings to get on well with others.
C. They suffer from anxiety as a result of their inability to communicate.
D. Trying to communicate with others make them mentally exhausted.
Câu 4: Which blood type personality is intuitive and self-confident?
A. Type B
B. Type O
C. Type AB
D. Type A
Câu 5: Which blood type personality does not let emotion affect their assessment?
A. Type O
B. Type AB
C. Type A
D. Type B
Câu 6: What is shared between blood type A personality and blood type B personality?
A. They prioritize others’ needs.
B. They can become great leaders.
C. They get on well with people.
D. They are naturally outgoing.
Câu 7: What can the word “deciphering” in paragraph (B) be best replaced by?
A. discovering
B. feeling
C. translating
D. cracking
Câu 8: Which of the following sentences defines an unfamiliar term?
A. The passage explains the meaning of "bura hara."
B. The passage describes the personality traits of Type A.
C. The passage discusses the discrimination against Type B individuals.
D. The passage compares different blood type personalities.
Câu 9: What is NOT true about blood type O personality?
A. They are down-to-earth and often follow the rules.
B. Their unpopularity with people makes them lonely.
C. They use willpower to achieve what they want.
D. Their physical strength gives them advantages in sports.
Câu 10: Which of the following can serve best as the title

options.A: It is more popular in Asian countries than in the West.
options.B: It is used in schools and workplaces to categorize people.
options.C: It was originally developed by a Japanese scientist.
options.D: Its accuracy has been supported with scientific data.

options.C: They suffer from anxiety as a result of their inability to communicate.
options.D: Trying to communicate with others make them mentally exhausted.

options.C: They get on well with people.

What your blood type can tell you
